availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born physician. Married Malvina Burch. Father of Rhodes Burch Rankins and Malvina (Rankins) Roberts.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Georgetown, District 1, p. 127.

Find A Grave, Entry for Dr Paul Rankins (1823-1872), Find A Grave Memorial # 104195186, Georgetown Cemetery, Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=rankins&GSfn=paul&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=104195186&df=all& (accessed 13 Aug 2017).
